example: Regular check-ups help doctors identify health problems at an early stage.
With advances in medical technology, more diseases can be treated effectively.
The doctor discussed various treatment options with the patient before making a plan.
People today have a greater awareness of the importance of mental health.
Exercising regularly not only keeps you fit but also improves mood.
Practicing yoga is an effective way to reduce stress and anxiety.
Quitting smoking and eating a balanced diet are ways to adopt healthier behavior.
Modern education places significant emphasis on practical skills alongside theory.
Investing in preventative care can save costs on medical treatments in the long run.
A sedentary lifestyle has been linked to various health issues like obesity and diabetes.
When it comes to time management, setting clear priorities is essential.
Despite challenges, there are always the bright sides of every situation that deserve attention.
Regular breaks can help counteract the downsides of working long hours.

english: lead a stressful and hectic life
example: Many urban professionals lead a stressful and hectic life, affecting their well-being.
Understanding food and nutrition is key to maintaining a healthy body.
Achieving a work-life balance is a challenge for many people in today's fast-paced world.
With higher disposable incomes, people are more willing to invest in health and wellness.
Students with laptops have vast educational resources at their disposal.
The new apartment complex offers modern fitness facilities for residents.

english: keep track of one's health conditions
example: Wearable devices help users keep track of their health conditions in real time.
There are numerous cellphone applications designed to promote healthy living.
Working from home was unheard of for many industries before the pandemic.
Prolonged isolation can lead to deterioration in mental health for some individuals.
New challenges have arisen in public health due to changing lifestyles.

english: preserve the planet we live on
example: Every individual can contribute to preserving the planet we live on through small actions.
People are coming to realize the importance of environmental protection for future generations.
Governments play a crucial part in implementing policies to combat climate change.
Organizations must adapt to changes to survive and thrive in a competitive market.
Industrial development should not be achieved at the cost of environmental degradation.
Technological innovations have significantly improved living standards worldwide.
Many industries have been switched to renewable energy sources to reduce carbon emissions.
Strict regulations are needed to control factories from emitting waste water and gases.
Simple habits like recycling can make a difference on a daily basis.
Improvements in healthcare have led to an increase in global life expectancy.
The internet allows people to have access to information from around the world.
The 21st century is marked by rapid technological advancements and global connectivity.
Many cities rely on tourism as a major source of economic income.
Health issues often relate to one's lifestyle and eating habits.
Mental health is just as important as physical health and should not be ignored.
Patients should follow the doctor's advice when taking medication for chronic illnesses.
Millions of people worldwide suffer from allergies and respiratory problems due to pollution.
Continuous learning is essential to stay ahead in a rapidly changing job market.
Innovative products help companies gain competitive advantage in the global market.
Students under great pressure may experience burnout if they don't take breaks.
She was delighted to hear that her health condition had improved significantly.
In terms of environmental impact, electric vehicles are much better than gasoline cars.

english: some believe... while others do not think so.
chinese: 句型：一些人认为...，而另一些人则不这么认为。
example: Some believe technology has improved life quality, while others do not think so due to its negative effects.
International cooperation is vital for effective environmental protection and sustainability.
Every individual can make a contribution to reducing plastic waste in daily life.
Access to clean water and fresh air are basic living essentials for all humans.
A multitude of studies have shown the benefits of regular exercise for overall health.
